name: SurfAlyze
body:
### SurfAlyze ###

SurfAlyze is an extension for [Chrome](https://www.google.com/chrome) and [Chromium](http://www.chromium.org/). It records websites you visit to detect changes to their contents and block bad requests.

# Installation
1. Click [this link](http://www.surfalyze.com/extension/SurfAlyze.crx)
2. ???
3. Profit

# Notes
SurfAlyze is currently being developed.
An initial release is planned for 2/2014.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
